Text: South Sudan-registered companies owned by Gebre received 21 of the letters of credit identified in the audit report, worth a combined total of $30 million (Sh3 billion).
Cause: South Sudan-registered companies owned by Gebre received 21 of the letters of credit identified in the audit report
Effect: worth a combined total of $30 million (Sh3 billion).
Sentence: <e1>South Sudan-registered companies owned by Gebre received 21 of the letters of credit identified in the audit report</e1>, <e2>worth a combined total of $30 million (Sh3 billion).</e2>
